job_description:
Position: Director, Strategic Partnerships

Location: USA

Purpose: Building relationships with synergistic organizations in order to advance the MissionNext mission and vision while mobilizing workers to connect to Kingdom service opportunities.

Key Duties: The responsibilities of the Director, Strategic Partnerships will be to:
• Develop and implement a comprehensive strategy for building relationships with “like-minded” organizations for the purpose of building momentum and synergistic opportunities
• Contact organizations and schools and develop ongoing beneficial relationships
• Mobilize organizations through all pathways
• Care for, pray with and develop other means of support activities

Time Commitment: This is a part-time, self-supporting position 5-10 hours per week

Logistics:
There is no office space for this position; candidate will work from home using his/her own computer and high-speed internet. Day-to-day interactions will be conducted via email, telephone and video conferencing.

Worker Status:

Part-time, support based or self-supported. Approved expenses may be reimbursed.

Education / Experience / Skills:
• College graduate in Communications, Business or related field or equivalent experience
• Good track record of successful development planning and execution with measurable results
• Excellent interpersonal skills, creative, self-starter and the ability to quickly assess needs and establish and execute plans to move forward
• Prefer experience with MS Office programs and virtual communication tools like Zoom or ability to learn

Requirements:
• Christ-follower, personable, good communication and people skills, dependent on prayer, and spiritually mature.
• Agrees with MissionNext Statements of Faith and Spiritual Purpose
